typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		seq as string,
		first as string,
		last as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		phone as string,
		postal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Blob
Blob sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CosmosDB
